org.javaavc.platform

Class Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.javaavc.platform.Platform
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Linux, Windows

    public abstract class Platform
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for platform-specific code. Sub-classes should implement code specific for some OS.
    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)

        public void unpackJarToDir(java.net.URL jarUrl,

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • unpackNativeLibrary

        public java.io.File unpackNativeLibrary(java.lang.String libName,
                               java.lang.String libVer)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Unpack native library from JAR-file to temporary directory and return File to it.

        Will be found resource in format LibName_OsName_Arch (for example, mylib_linux_64), copied into temporary directory and returned File of this copy (for example, /tmp/mylib_linux_64).

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getPlatform

        public static Platform getPlatform()

      • getSystemProperties

        public static java.lang.String getSystemProperties()
        Return all system properties as a string.

      • getJnaPathFiles

        public static java.util.List<java.io.File> getJnaPathFiles()
        Return list of directories for search JNA native code (based on "jna.library.path" system property).

      • addJnaPathFile

        public static void addJnaPathFile(java.io.File newClassPath)
        Add new path to JNA native code search (based on "jna.library.path" system property).

      • getJavaTempDirectoryFile

        public static java.io.File getJavaTempDirectoryFile()
        Return file object for system temporary directory.
